cursor.description: Deploy Cursor Cloud Agent for autonomous coding. Supports Opus 4.5 Thinking, Sonnet 4.5 Thinking, Gemini 3 Pro, GPT-5.1, GPT-5 Codex, Grok, and Auto model selection. Uses headless CLI mode (-p) for programmatic automation in CI/CD pipelines. Agents can clone repos, make changes, create branches, and open PRs autonomously.

prompt.description: Task instructions for the Cursor agent. Be specific about what code changes to make.

print_mode.description: Enable non-interactive print mode for headless/CI automation. Required for programmatic usage.

model.description: Model selection: auto, opus-4.5-thinking, sonnet-4.5-thinking, gemini-3-pro, gpt-5.1, gpt-5-codex, grok. Defaults to auto for intelligent model selection.

force.description: Allow direct file modifications without confirmation prompts. Use with caution.

output_format.description: Output format: text (human-readable), json (structured single result), stream-json (NDJSON realtime events)

api_key.description: Cursor API key for authentication. Can also use CURSOR_API_KEY env var.

env_vars.CURSOR_API_KEY: API key for headless authentication (obtain from cursor.com/settings)

notes.authentication: Use CURSOR_API_KEY env var or --api-key flag for headless mode
notes.thinking_models: opus-4.5-thinking and sonnet-4.5-thinking support extended thinking with tool use
notes.auto_model: Recommended: let Cursor auto-select the best model for the task
